name: Munojot Yolchiyeva
description: '''Munojot Yo{{okina}}lchiyeva''' (born 1960), also known under the Russian form of her name, '''Munadjat Yulchieva''', a performer of classical [[Uzbek music]] and its Persian-language cousin [[Shashmaqam|Shashmaq√¢m]]. She is famous for the unique quality of her voice and her natural charisma. She is recognized as ''[[People's artist of Uzbekistan]]'' (1994). She is honored as the ''Heroine of Uzbekistan'' (2021).
